sect1.para:
The following open-source software is required to build an InterMine database:
The Java SDK is required to build and use InterMine PostgreSQL is used as the relational backing store. Ensure that the postmaster is set up to accept TCP/IP connections ("tcpip_socket=true" in postgresql.conf) from "localhost" (host 127.0.0.1 in pg_ident.conf) The Ant tool is used the invoke the InterMine build

In addition, if remote query access is to be provided then Tomcat is required for deployment of the web front-end or the webservice. Ensure that the "manager" application is installed and that the following configuration information is present:
$CATALINA_HOME/conf/tomcat-users.xml:
<tomcat-users> ... <role rolename="manager"/> <user username="manager" password="manager" roles="manager"/> </tomcat-users>
